articles.title: First Lassa fever case in 15-years diagnosed in KZN - eNCA
articles.description: The first case of Lassa fever in 15 years has been diagnosed in South Africa. The patient fell ill on his return to KwaZulu-Natal after travelling to Nigeria. He was treated in a Pietermaritzburg hospital but has since died.
